comment.author: 40147761@N04
comment._content: Absolutely Beautiful.! I love being able to see these. My hope is that people will post pictures of these things today and we can link them through the comments. They made so many wonderful things for us to enjoy. So many of their projects are being lost, forgotten, rebuilt and destroyed. I feel an urgency to get people to seek out and photograph these bits of our history. Thank You OSU Archives and Gerald W. Williams Collection For posting all of these wonderful images for us to enjoy !!!!!! Hi, I'm an admin for a group called CCC, Civilian Conservation Corps Photos, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
